events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering roles based on your experience and skills.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview was successful, and you demonstrated a strong understanding of software development fundamentals.
The candidate responded promptly to the interview outcome, expressing enthusiasm for the next steps in the hiring process.
We have scheduled your technical interview for the Software Engineer role on 2024-06-10 at 14:00 UTC.
You completed the technical interview successfully, showcasing in-depth knowledge in programming and problem-solving.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for 2024-06-15 at 11:00 UTC to discuss cultural fit and other details.
The HR interview went well, and you expressed a great alignment with the companyâ€™s values and culture.
An offer has been proposed to you for the Software Engineer position including details about salary, benefits, and start date.
You have accepted the offer enthusiastically and are eager to start your role within our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun, including orientation sessions and integration with the engineering team.
The hiring process is now complete, and you are officially a Software Engineer at our company. Welcome aboard!
